about life and thougt of samurai in medieval period!I hope you can help me more
on this direction..thanks!I am an historian and in this moment this are my
priorities!

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Other good Samrai groops
messages.msgSnippet: My interest is primarily Japanese swords and related arts. Some armour study, all of which means one must study history. If you are interested in swords I can
messages.messageBody:
My interest is primarily Japanese swords and related arts. Some armour
study, all of which means one must study history. If you are interested in
swords I can recommend both groups below. The first if like the name says
for Yahoos! lots of good natured joking and fun, several knowledgeable
people and often some otherwise hard to find info.
The second is focused on art swords and while not snobbish is a bit more
serious about it. The list master is an avowed expert on modern blades so
this is often a subject there. I invite anyone who is interested to drop in
or is that on?

Tom

To manage your options for this group:

Post message: nihonto@yahoogroups.com
Subscribe: nihonto-subscribe@yahoogroups.com
Unsubscribe: nihonto-unsubscribe@yahoogroups.com
Nihonto group website: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nihonto

Remember: Honor is your most important attribute!


To subscribe or unsubscribe, to the token_kenkyu_kai discussion list,
send the following 1-line message to:
<listproc@...>

SUBSCRIBE TOKEN_KENKYU_KAI
or
UNSUBSCRIBE TOKEN_KENKYU_KAI

To submit a message to the list, send to:
<token_kenkyu_kai@...>
******

--- In samuraihistory@y..., "squrpio_prince" <squrpio_prince@y...>
wrote:
> This is a great group and I was wondering if there are any other

KALLIKRATES : Take a look here :
http://www.google.com.br/search?q=samurai+discussion+Lists&ie=UTF-
8&oe=UTF-8&hl=pt&btnG=Pesquisa+Google&lr=
You might find something of interest but I believe this Forum is
possibly your best bet.
with my best regards
